name: FriendTrip (montero)
description:
A game about finding your missing friends in an increasingly absurd world. 

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement. E to interact with NPCs, pickup items, and interact with the environment if necessary (like opening the fridge). Spacebar or click the next button to advance dialogue.

Credits: 

  • Aim Diab - Programming
  • Josh Montero - Design, Additional Art
  • Michael Marney-Brusstar - Music Composition & Sound Design
  • Ryan McConnell - Art & Animation

Link to Global Game Jam 2019 Page:

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/friendtrip
